means: 求助于或诉诸某事物，采取某手段或方法应急或作为对策
热闹场所，娱乐场，度假胜地

sentence.Network_en: For a beach resort with a difference, try Key West.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果想去一个与众不同的海滨度假胜地，那就去基韦斯特吧。

sentence.Network_en: They would in the last resort support their friends whatever they did.
sentence.Network_cn: 无论他们的朋友做了什么，他们最终都会支持他们的朋友。

sentence.Network_en: The resort is surrounded by extensive national and regional parklands.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个度假胜地被广阔的国家和地区绿地所环绕。

phrase.cizu_name: as a first (或 last 或 final) resort

jx.jx_en_mean: before anything else is attempted (or when all else has failed)
jx.jx_cn_mean: 作为第一招，作为一开始就采取的行动（或最后一招，作为万不得已时所采取的行动）
最后，在没有其他办法时

lj.lj_ly: in the last resort what really moves us is our personal convictions.
lj.lj_ls: 最终策励我们行动的是我们的个人信念。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (denoting something one can turn to for assistance): from Old French resortir, from re- 'again' + sortir 'come or go out'. The sense 'place frequently visited' dates from the mid 18th cent

entry.def: If you resort to a course of action that you do not really approve of, you adopt it because you cannot see any other way of achieving what you want.

example.ex: His punishing work schedule had made him resort to drugs...
example.tran: 异常紧张的工作安排使他开始吸毒。

example.ex: Some schools have resorted to recruiting teachers from overseas.
example.tran: 有些学校不得不开始从海外招收老师。

entry.def: If you achieve something without resort to a particular course of action, you succeed without carrying out that action. To have resort to a particular course of action means to have to do that action in order to achieve something.

example.ex: Congress has a responsibility to ensure that all peaceful options are exhausted before resort to war.
example.tran: 国会有责任确保只有在所有和平手段都不奏效的情况下才会诉诸战争。

entry.def: A resort is a place where a lot of people spend their holidays.
If you do something as a last resort, you do it because you can find no other way of getting out of a difficult situation or of solving a problem.

example.ex: Nuclear weapons should be used only as a last resort...
example.tran: 不到万不得已时不能选择使用核武器。

example.ex: As a last resort you may have to accept their point of view.
example.tran: 最终，你可能不得不接受他们的观点。

entry.def: You use in the last resort when stating the most basic or important fact that will still be true in a situation whatever else happens.

example.ex: They would in the last resort support their friends whatever they did.
example.tran: 无论他们的朋友做了什么，他们最终都会支持他们的朋友。

means.word_mean: 1. a hotel located in a resort area
3. something or someone turned to for assistance or security;
4. act of turning to for assistance;

sentences.sentence: "an appeal to his uncle was his last resort"

means.word_mean: 2. move, travel, or proceed toward some place;

sentences.sentence: "He repaired to his cabin in the woods"

auth_sentence.content: But use this credit only as a last resort.
auth_sentence.res_content: But use this credit only as a last resort.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But use this credit only as a last resort.

auth_sentence.content: Surgery should only be considered as a last resort.
auth_sentence.res_content: Surgery should only be considered as a last resort.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Surgery should only be considered as a last resort.

auth_sentence.content: Bankruptcy should be considered only as a last resort.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bankruptcy should be considered only as a last resort.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bankruptcy should be considered only as a last resort.

Sentence.sentence: Meetings at resorts are suddenly unacceptable.
Resorting to economic, legal and psychological means.
The beach resort is a good choice.
They resorted to unethical practice to meet their sales quota.
Harrogate became a fashionable resort during Victorian times, when people came to take a bath in the mineral waters.

means.word_mean: 求助于或诉诸某事物; 采取某手段或方法应急或作为对策

sentences.en: One has sometimes to resort to these little devices.
sentences.cn: 人们有时还得依靠这些小玩意儿。

means.word_mean: 常去；前往(某处)(常与to连用)

sentences.en: Many teachers and students resort to Beidaihe beach in the summer vacation.
sentences.cn: 很多教师和学生在暑假中去北戴河海滨。

means.word_mean: 求助, 凭借, 诉诸

sentences.en: He couldn't have passed the exam without resort to cheating.
sentences.cn: 他要不是靠作弊是通不过这次考试的。

means.word_mean: 求助[凭借]的对象; 采用的办法

sentences.en: Friends are the best resort in trouble.
sentences.cn: 在困难中, 朋友是最好的可以求助的人。

means.word_mean: 度假胜地, 旅游胜地

sentences.en: The park is one of his favourite resorts.
sentences.cn: 这公园是他最喜欢去的地方之一。

jushi.english: One has sometimes to resort to these little devices.
jushi.chinese: 人们有时还得依靠这些小玩意儿。

jushi.english: She resorted to stealing when she had no more money.
As a last resort we could borrow more money from the bank.
jushi.chinese: 作为最后的手段,我们可以向银行再借些钱。
